attributes.action: scrap any proposed agreement to a Radio Frequency Identification(RFID) chip in our hand,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
be this in the form of a verichip(tm) of any other RFID on our cars or in our credit cards. This is a gross invasion of the privacy and movements of all people with one in. If this goes ahead we can never call this a free country again.
THe plan to have your DNA,iris scan and all your bank and credit cards in this form is wrong. anyone can be stopped from buying or trading anything with the tick of a single box and located anywhere they are.
